trans-unit.source: Represents a single row of data and its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料的單一資料列及其中繼資料 (Metadata)。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This class is used together with <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe> to send result sets to the client from managed code stored-procedures.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會搭配<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe>從 managed 程式碼預存程序，傳送給用戶端的結果集。

trans-unit.source: When writing common language runtime (CLR) applications, you should re-use existing `SqlDataRecord` objects instead of creating new ones every time.
trans-unit.target: 當撰寫 common language runtime (CLR) 應用程式，應該重新使用現有的`SqlDataRecord`物件，而非每次建立新的。

trans-unit.source: Creating many new `SqlDataRecord` objects could severely deplete memory and adversely affect performance.
trans-unit.target: 建立許多新`SqlDataRecord`物件可能會嚴重耗盡記憶體和效能產生負面影響。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create several <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlMetaData> objects, which describe the column metadata of a record, and creating a <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立數個<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlMetaData>物件，描述的資料行中繼資料記錄，以及建立<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord>。

trans-unit.source: The column values of the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord> are set and the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord> is sent to the calling program by using the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlContext> class.
trans-unit.target: 資料行值<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord>設定和<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord>使用傳送至呼叫端程式<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlContext>類別。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlMetaData" /> objects that describe each column in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlMetaData" /> 物件陣列，描述 <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord" /> 中的每個資料行。

trans-unit.source: Inititializes a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord" /> instance with the schema based on the array of <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlMetaData" /> objects passed as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 根據做為引數傳遞的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlMetaData" /> 物件陣列，使用結構描述來初始化新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord> object from two <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlMetaData> objects, which indicate the column name and data type.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立新<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord>來自兩個物件<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlMetaData>指出資料行名稱和資料類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="metaData" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="metaData" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of columns in the data row.
trans-unit.target: 取得此資料列中的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns in the data row as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 此資料列中的資料行數目，為整數。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based ordinal of the column.
trans-unit.target: 資料行以零為起始的序數。

trans-unit.target: 做為 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 的資料行值。

trans-unit.target: 取得資料行的值，其由該序數指定為 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes copied.
trans-unit.target: 已複製的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to obtain a binary value either in a single call or in chunks.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您取得的單一呼叫中，或是以區塊的二進位值。

trans-unit.source: Getting the value in chunks is useful for large values or values of unknown size.
trans-unit.target: 取得區塊 （chunk） 的值是適用於大數值或未知大小的值。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the value in several chunks, allocate a byte array of the chunk-size and call <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord.GetBytes%2A> repeatedly, adjusting the `fieldOffset` parameter accordingly in each call.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得數個區塊中的值，配置的位元組陣列的區塊大小和呼叫<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord.GetBytes%2A>重複調整`fieldOffset`參數據以在每個呼叫。

trans-unit.target: 傳回儲存在資料行、以 SQL Server 類型表示，並由資料行序數指定的資料值。

trans-unit.target: 資料行的值，以 SQL Server 類型表示並做為 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: For null values, a SQL Server type instance is returned where the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A> property is true.
trans-unit.target: 為 null 的值的 SQL Server 型別執行個體傳回 where<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A>屬性為 true。

trans-unit.source: The array into which to copy the values column values.
trans-unit.target: 要將值資料行值複製到其中的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the values for all the columns in the record, expressed as SQL Server types, in an array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回陣列記錄中所有資料行的值，表示為 SQL Server 類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that indicates the number of columns copied.
trans-unit.target: 指出複製之資料行數目的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />。

trans-unit.source: The SQL Server type values of the column are copied into the `values` array that is passed as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 型別資料行的值會複製到`values`做為參數傳遞的陣列。

trans-unit.source: For null values, a Sql type instance is returned where the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A> property is true.
trans-unit.target: 為 null 值，Sql 型別執行個體傳回 where<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A>屬性為 true。

trans-unit.source: The length of the `values` array does not need to match the number of columns in the record.
trans-unit.target: 長度`values`陣列不需要符合的記錄中的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: If the array length is greater than the number of columns, all of the column values are copied into the array; if it is less, only the array length number of column values are copied into the array, starting at the column value with ordinal 0.
trans-unit.target: 陣列長度大於資料行數目，如果所有的資料行值複製到陣列。如果是小於，只有陣列長度的資料行值數目會複製到陣列中，資料行值與序數 0 開始。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="values" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="values" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: There is a type mismatch.
trans-unit.target: 類型不符。

trans-unit.source: If the array length is greater than the number of columns, all of the column values are copied into the array; if it is less, only the array length number of column values is copied into the array, starting at the column value with ordinal 0.
trans-unit.target: 陣列長度大於資料行數目，如果所有的資料行值複製到陣列。如果是小於，只有陣列長度的資料行值數目會複製到在資料行的值與序數 0 為起始的陣列。
